steps.name: tests
steps.command: if [ -f vendor/bin/phpunit ]; then if [ -f phpunit.xml ]; then vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml; elif [ -f phpunit.xml.dist ]; then vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml.dist; elif [ -d tests ]; then vendor/bin/phpunit tests; else echo 'No PHPUnit config/tests found; skipping tests.'; fi; fi
